casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Reginal FULLARD. No. 455P14-4. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Reginald Fullard, Lumberton, for Fullard, Reginald. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th of November 2015 by Defendant to Withdraw Unconstitutionally Construed Instrument that Violates Due Process:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
